content: to make a loop then round 1 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 1tr 1ch 1tr 2ch 3 times 1tr 1ch slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 2 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1dtr 1dtr 1ch 1tr in same space *1ch skip 1 1tr in chain space 1ch skip 1 ** 1tr 1ch 2dtr 1ch 1tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space 1ch sl st into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 3 4ch counts as 1dtr 1dtr 1tr in next dtr *1ch 1tr in chain space 1ch skip 1 1tr in chain space 3 times 1ch ** 1tr 1dtr in dtr 1dtr 1tr in next dtr repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting st slip_stitch into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 4 4ch counts as 1dtr 1dtr 2tr in next dtr *1tr 2ch skip 1ch 1tr 1tr in chain space 1ch skip 1 1tr in chain space twice 2ch skip 1tr 1ch 1tr ** 2tr 1dtr in dtr 1dtr 2tr in next dtr repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 2tr in starting st slip_stitch into 4th chain of beg 4ch round 5 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 2tr in next dtr *3tr 1tr in next chain 2ch skip 1ch 1tr 1tr in chain space 1ch skip 1 1tr in chain space 2ch skip 1tr 1ch 1tr in next chain 3tr** 2tr in dtr 2ch 2tr in next dtr repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting st slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 6 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 2tr in same space *6tr 1tr in next chain 2ch skip 1ch 1tr 1tr in chain space 2ch skip 1tr 1ch 1tr in next chain 6tr** 2tr 2ch 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch round 7 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 2tr in same space *9tr 1tr in next chain 1ch skip 1ch 1tr 1ch skip 1ch 1tr in next chain 9tr** 2tr 2ch 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch © 2019 sandra paul 10 of 28 nature s walk blanket free www cherryheart co uk round 8 slip_stitch in chain space 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 2tr in same space *12tr 1tr in chain space 1ch skip 1 1tr in chain space 12tr** 2tr 2ch 2tr in corner space repeat from * 3 times ending the last repeat at ** 1tr in starting space slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beg 4ch flower with yarn f chain 4 slip_stitch into first chain to make a loop then round 1 4ch counts as 1tr 1ch 1tr 1ch
